org.scec.param.editor.event
Interface ParameterChangeListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
IMRParameterChangeListenerAPI
All Known Implementing Classes:
ParameterApplet, IMRGuiBean
public interface ParameterChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Title: ParameterChangeListener
Description: The change listener receives change events whenever one of the Parameters have been edited in the ParameterEditor. The listener is typically the Main Application that wants to do something with the changed data, such as generate a new plot.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:

Method Summary
 void parameterChange(ParameterChangeEvent event)
          Function that must be implemented by all Listeners for ParameterChangeEvents.
